reviewText: AMAZING and POWERFUL dvd for any dancer that wants to understand and learn what prophetic dance ministry is. It will not only activate but impart the many creative ways that Abba Father speaks to his children.
The Prophetic Dance DVD by Pastor Lynn Hayden is a Powerful and Excellent DVD  You learn a variety of ways to minister in the prophetic.

The Prophetic Dance DVD is wonderful!  I learned so much about prophetic dance dos and donts and was especially informed on when, where and how such a ministering dance would be appropriate.  Be blessed!

This Prophetic Dance video covered a wide gamut of techniques, guidelines, and styles of prophetic dance. If you want to learn how to reach deeply into the heart, soul, and spirit of others to express the heart of our Heavenly Father, then this video teaching is for you.
Prophetic for some people can be new or misunderstood. With this ressource you will have clarity and more experience.

Awesome DVD about Prophetic Dance!! If you do not have a clue about this subject, this is a great video to watch!! Pastor Lynn shares the heart of the Father for Prophetic Dance and provides really good exercises and demonstrations in how to activate and learn about this type of dance.
This Prophetic Dance - DVD will share how you can minister to others in movement and in" spirit and in truth"!
Excellent DVD!  Great teaching and many examples shown!  A must have!

Pastor Lynn's Prophetic Dance DVD goes hand in hand with her Prophetic Dance book. The wealth of knowledge and exercises shared in the book are demonstrated visually in the DVD to help further demystify prophetic dance. You will watch Pastor Lynn minister to people through dance as well as help active the gift in others. I came away from watching this video encouraged because it helped me realize that the Lord can use anyone in prophetic dance. You do not need to be a professional dancer or have an extremely powerful prophetic gift. Pastor Lynn explains how all we need is a willingness to be used by our Father and to seek a close relationship with Him, then He will do the anointing of our dances and use them for His purposes. I highly recommend this DVD for those who want to learn more about prophetic dance and those who want to be touched personally through prophetic dance. This DVD does it all.
